name: Sporelunk
description:
You’ve made a horrible mistake. A nightmarish abomination now seeks your spongy, mushroom-y flesh, and your only choice is to dig. Mine ever deeper into the procedurally-generated fungal caverns, discovering new biomes and managing your ever-depleting light. And whatever you do, don’t let it catch you.

Move with the [arrow keys]. Hold [Z] to mine. Consume fungal spores to replenish your light. Some blocks have unique properties, and the deeper you go, the weirder things get. Don’t stop digging.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 48 with the theme “deeper and deeper.”

Code by Joshua Edwards (@glenk_), art & animation by Cosmo Wegman (@crelishboy), music and SFX by Valerie (@Valbun1), and voice acting by Michael Duffin (@SardineKey).
